00034 #ifndef __DNA_OBJECT_FLUIDSIM_H__

00044 struct Mesh;

00047 typedef struct FluidVertexVelocity {
00048     float vel[3];
00049 } FluidVertexVelocity;
00050     
00051 typedef struct FluidsimSettings {
00052     struct FluidsimModifierData *fmd; /* for fast RNA access */
00053     /* domain,fluid or obstacle */
00054     short type;
00055     /* display advanced options in fluid sim tab (on=1,off=0)*/
00056     short show_advancedoptions;
00057 
00058     /* domain object settings */
00059     /* resolutions */
00060     short resolutionxyz;
00061     short previewresxyz;
00062     /* size of the domain in real units (meters along largest resolution x,y,z extent) */
00063     float realsize;
00064     /* show original meshes, preview or final sim */
00065     short guiDisplayMode;
00066     short renderDisplayMode;
00067 
00068     /* fluid properties */
00069     float viscosityValue;
00070     short viscosityMode DNA_DEPRECATED;
00071     short viscosityExponent;
00072     /* gravity strength */
00073     float grav[3];
00074     /* anim start end time (in seconds) */
00075     float animStart, animEnd;
00076     /* bake start end time (in blender frames) */
00077     int bakeStart, bakeEnd;
00078     /* offset for baked frames */
00079     int frameOffset;
00080     int pad;
00081     /* g star param (LBM compressibility) */
00082     float gstar;
00083     /* activate refinement? */
00084     int maxRefine;
00085     
00086     /* fluid object type settings */
00087     /* gravity strength */
00088     float iniVelx,iniVely,iniVelz;
00089 
00090     /* store pointer to original mesh (for replacing the current one) */
00091     struct Mesh *orgMesh;
00092     /* a mesh to display the bounding box used for simulation */
00093     struct Mesh *meshBB;
00094 
00095     /* store output path, and file prefix for baked fluid surface */
00096     /* strlens; 256= FILE_MAXFILE, 768= FILE_MAXDIR */
00097     char surfdataPath[1024];
00098 
00099     /* store start coords of axis aligned bounding box together with size */
00100     /* values are inited during derived mesh display */
00101     float bbStart[3], bbSize[3];
00102 
00103     /* animated params */
00104     struct Ipo *ipo;
00105 
00106     /* additional flags depending on the type, lower short contains flags
00107      * to check validity, higher short additional flags */
00108     short typeFlags;
00109     /* switch off velocity genration, volume init type for fluid/obstacles (volume=1,shell=2,both=3) */
00110     char  domainNovecgen,volumeInitType;
00111 
00112     /* boundary "stickiness" for part slip values */
00113     float partSlipValue;
00114 
00115     /* number of tracers to generate */
00116     int generateTracers;
00117     /* particle generation - on if >0, then determines amount (experimental...) */
00118     float generateParticles;
00119     /* smooth fluid surface? */
00120     float surfaceSmoothing;
00121     /* number of surface subdivisions*/
00122     int surfaceSubdivs;
00123     int flag; /* GUI flags */
00124 
00125     /* particle display - size scaling, and alpha influence */
00126     float particleInfSize, particleInfAlpha;
00127     /* testing vars */
00128     float farFieldSize;
00129 
00130     /* vertex velocities of simulated fluid mesh */
00131     struct FluidVertexVelocity *meshVelocities;
00132     /* number of vertices in simulated fluid mesh */
00133     int totvert;
00134     
00135     /* Fluid control settings */
00136     float cpsTimeStart;
00137     float cpsTimeEnd;
00138     float cpsQuality;
00139     
00140     float attractforceStrength;
00141     float attractforceRadius;
00142     float velocityforceStrength;
00143     float velocityforceRadius;
00144 
00145     int lastgoodframe;
00146     
00147     /* Simulation/flow rate control (i.e. old "Fac-Time") */
00148     float animRate;
00149 } FluidsimSettings;

00151 /* ob->fluidsimSettings defines */
00152 #define OB_FLUIDSIM_ENABLE          1
00153 #define OB_FLUIDSIM_DOMAIN          2
00154 #define OB_FLUIDSIM_FLUID           4
00155 #define OB_FLUIDSIM_OBSTACLE        8
00156 #define OB_FLUIDSIM_INFLOW          16
00157 #define OB_FLUIDSIM_OUTFLOW         32
00158 #define OB_FLUIDSIM_PARTICLE        64
00159 #define OB_FLUIDSIM_CONTROL         128
00160 
00161 #define OB_TYPEFLAG_START       7
00162 #define OB_FSGEO_THIN           (1<<(OB_TYPEFLAG_START+1))
00163 #define OB_FSBND_NOSLIP         (1<<(OB_TYPEFLAG_START+2))
00164 #define OB_FSBND_PARTSLIP       (1<<(OB_TYPEFLAG_START+3))
00165 #define OB_FSBND_FREESLIP       (1<<(OB_TYPEFLAG_START+4))
00166 #define OB_FSINFLOW_LOCALCOORD  (1<<(OB_TYPEFLAG_START+5))
00167 
00168 /* surface generation flag (part of enabling chapter 6 of "Free Surface Flows with Moving and Deforming Objects for LBM") */
00169 #define OB_FSSG_NOOBS           (1<<(OB_TYPEFLAG_START+6))
00170 
00171 // guiDisplayMode particle flags
00172 #define OB_FSDOM_GEOM     1
00173 #define OB_FSDOM_PREVIEW  2
00174 #define OB_FSDOM_FINAL    3
00175 #define OB_FSPART_BUBBLE  (1<<1)
00176 #define OB_FSPART_DROP    (1<<2)
00177 #define OB_FSPART_NEWPART (1<<3)
00178 #define OB_FSPART_FLOAT   (1<<4)
00179 #define OB_FSPART_TRACER  (1<<5)
00180 
00181 // new fluid bit flags for fss->flags
00182 #define OB_FLUIDSIM_REVERSE         (1 << 0)
00183 #define OB_FLUIDSIM_ACTIVE          (1 << 1)
00184 #define OB_FLUIDSIM_OVERRIDE_TIME   (1 << 2)
00185 
00186 #define OB_FLUIDSIM_SURF_PREVIEW_OBJ_FNAME "fluidsurface_preview_####.bobj.gz"
00187 #define OB_FLUIDSIM_SURF_FINAL_OBJ_FNAME   "fluidsurface_final_####.bobj.gz"
00188 #define OB_FLUIDSIM_SURF_FINAL_VEL_FNAME   "fluidsurface_final_####.bvel.gz"
00189 #define OB_FLUIDSIM_SURF_PARTICLES_FNAME   "fluidsurface_particles_####.gz"
